description: Take on the mountain with a ski jacket built to rise to the occasion on epic snow days. A waterproof-breathable shell keeps moisture out while an advanced thermal-reflective lining keeps heat in.  Ski-friendly features include multi-functional pockets, underarm venting, and an adjustable hood, cuffs, and hem.
name: Columbia Sportswear Aerial Ascender II Jacket - Tall - Mens

specs.value: 80g Microtemp XF II - 85% Recycled Polyester - 15% Polyester
